name: devopera-domotd
author: (c) Alex Stanhope, Devopera.com
summary: Message of the Day (MOTD) installation and configuration module
description:
The Message of the Day (MOTD) can be used to show system information at login time.  
For the Devopera family of modules, it shows a summary of host information (size/spec of machine), 
network setup (IP/MAC), what's installed (profiles and services) and exposed ports.
